info.title: Platform Administration Legacy API v1
info.description: Legacy v1 Platform API endpoints for platform administration domain including businesses, staff, tokens, webhooks, categories, fields, forms, and directory management

get.description: Search for a business by external_reference_id or email. A filter is required for the API to return a result.

parameters.description: Filter by email specified (make sure its URL-encoded)
parameters.name: email

parameters.description: Filter by "external_id" specified. **Deprecate**. This will still work, but for new implementation please use external_reference_id.
parameters.name: external_id

country_name.description: Business's Country. Must be a valid country name

display_name.description: Owner's display name. Up to 255 characters, no HTML tags, no new lines (if not provided, FIRST NAME + LAST NAME will be used)

email.description: Owner's email, also used as the business's main email

first_name.description: Owner's first name. Up to 255 characters, no HTML tags, no new lines

language.description: One of en,es,fr,it,pt,de,pl,nl,en-GB. Default determined by Directory

last_name.description: Owner's last name. Up to 255 characters, no HTML tags, no new lines

phone.description: Business phone number. Up to 20 characters

address.description: Business address. Up to 255 characters, no HTML tags

business_category.description: The business main occupation. Must be a valid business category

business_maturity_in_years.description: Business maturity in years. Valid value is one of [null, 0, 0.5, 0.5-2, 2+]

hide_address.description: Whether to show the business address to clients

name.description: Business name. Up to 100 characters, no HTML tags, no new lines

get.description: Validates username/password credentials for login. The API will be blocked for the username after 5 failed attempts.

post.description: This API performs entitlement verification for businesses seeking to register with a specific partner. It checks if a business meets the necessary criteria to qualify for partnership enrollment.

unique_validation_identifier.description: The future business' unique validation identifier

country_name.description: Business’s Country. Must be a valid country name

display_name.description: Owner’s display name. Up to 255 characters, no HTML tags, no new lines (if not provided, FIRST NAME + LAST NAME will be used)

email.description: Owner’s email, also used as the business’s main email

first_name.description: Owner’s first name. Up to 255 characters, no HTML tags, no new lines

language.description: One of en,es,fr,it,pt,de,pl,nl,en-GB,he,keys,pseudo - Default value is determined by the Directory

last_name.description: Owner’s last name. Up to 255 characters, no HTML tags, no new lines

phone.description: Business phone number. Up to 20 characters

address.description: Business address. Up to 255 characters, no HTML tags

business_category.description: The business main occupation. Must be a valid business category

business_maturity_in_years.description: Business maturity in years. Valid value is one of [null, 0, 0.5, 0.5-2, 2+]

landing_page.description: Deprecated - Previously used for marketing purposes, up to 255 characters

logo_url.description: Business logo URL - A valid image URL. Supporting formats: jpg, jpeg, gif, png, SVG. Make sure the URL includes one of these extensions

name.description: Business name. Up to 100 characters, no HTML tags, no new lines

phone.description: Business phone number. Up to 20 characters

scheduling_disabled.description: Business is not offering online scheduling through client portal

short_description.description: Short description of the business. Up to 255 characters, no HTML tags

time_zone.description: Time zone name from MAPPING object found in: https://api.rubyonrails.org/v4.2.3/classes/ActiveSupport/TimeZone.html . Default value is determined by the Directory

website_url.description: Business’s website URL. Must be a valid URL address including http/https.

external_id.description: Legacy, replaced by external_reference_id. It may also be referred to as a 'nickname'. Must contain at least one lowercase letter, can include numbers, and dots, at least 5 characters long, platform unique

plan_name.description: Package name to subscribe the external party instance to

site_url.description: Site url of the external party instance

external_subscription_params.description: External Subscription Parameters (should not be used with recurly type)

plan_name.description: Package name to subscribe (for manual type) / recurly plan code (for recurly type)

staff_slots.description: Staff sub accounts limit (should not be used with recurly type)

get.description: Get Directory's branding including logo url and colors, available for **Staff & Directory Tokens**

parameters.description: How many items to return per page. Default: 25. Max: 100
parameters.name: per_page

app_id.description: A unique identifier for a 3rd party application.

business_id.description: A unique identifier for a business.

directory_id.description: A unique identifier for a partner.

entity.description: Entity to subscribe to (e.g. client, appointment)

parameters.description:
Filtering the list of webhooks.
Filter is a 'deepObject' works with:
  1. 'entity' - object which listen to event (example: client)
  2. 'event_type' - type of event to triger hoom (example: created)

Example:
  <url>?filter[entity]=client&filter[event_type]=created
parameters.name: filter

put.description: Updates purchased items for a business

get.description: Get Staff List and Details (ordered by position field).

invite.description: Send invite to staff on creation

role.description: Please use the new Access Control API: https://developers.intandem.tech/v3.0/docs/main-concepts

delete.description: End Staff Member active sessions and log out from browser.

get.description: Gets a list of available wizards
Gets a wizard by given name

put.description: Update a wizard with given name

parameters.description: Filter only active services or all
parameters.name: only_active_services

parameters.description: Filter only active services or all
parameters.name: only_active_services
